EATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 23 May 2023
Condition of Rain:
A few showers may occur in the sea areas off the coast extending from Colombo to Matara
via Galle.
Winds:
Winds will be south-westerly over sea area around the island and speed will be (20-35) kmph.
Wind speed may increase up to (40-45) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar.
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar will be
fairly rough at times.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
